profile.name: Serhii
profile.title: Software Developer
profile.summary: Experienced full-stack developer with 6+ years in JavaScript, React, and Node.js. Passionate about building performant, user-focused applications with clean, maintainable code.

react_experience.content: I have 4+ years of professional React development experience. I've built 20+ production applications using modern React patterns including hooks, context API, and performance optimization. I've led React migration projects from class components to functional components and mentored junior developers. Some key projects include an e-commerce platform with complex state management, an admin dashboard with real-time updates, and several portfolio websites. I'm particularly excited about React's concurrent features and Suspense.

javascript_experience.content: JavaScript is my primary language with 6+ years of experience. I work with modern ES6+ features, async/await patterns, and both browser and Node.js environments. I love exploring new JavaScript APIs and performance optimization techniques. I've built everything from vanilla DOM manipulation to complex async workflows. I'm comfortable with module systems, event handling, and performance optimization.

nodejs_experience.content: I've been building backend services with Node.js for 3+ years. I love the JavaScript everywhere approach and the rich npm ecosystem. I've built REST APIs, GraphQL services, and real-time applications with Socket.io. I work with various frameworks like Express, Fastify, and NestJS, and integrate with databases like MongoDB and PostgreSQL.

typescript_experience.content: TypeScript has become essential in my workflow over the past 3+ years. I love how it catches errors early and makes refactoring safer. I'm comfortable with advanced types, generics, utility types, and the whole TypeScript ecosystem. I use it for both frontend React applications and backend Node.js services.

scss_experience.content: SCSS is my go-to for styling with 4+ years of experience. I follow BEM methodology and focus on maintainable, reusable styles. I love using mixins, functions, and variables to create organized, modular stylesheets. I have experience with responsive design and CSS architecture patterns.

portfolio_project.content: This portfolio website demonstrates my technical skills through a performance-optimized static site. I built it with vanilla JavaScript and SCSS to keep it lightweight and fast. It features multi-language support, responsive design, and now includes this AI chat feature. Performance was a key focus - the site loads in under 2 seconds.

ecommerce_project.content: I built a complete e-commerce solution with React frontend and Node.js backend. The project included shopping cart functionality, Stripe payment integration, real-time inventory updates, and an admin dashboard for order management. It was a great learning experience for handling complex user flows and state management.

education.content: I have a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science from Technical University, graduating with honors. The academic foundation really helped with understanding algorithms and system design. I loved the theoretical aspects that complement practical development work.

details.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
